thread.section_title: Blurb Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blurb | www.blurb.com
thread.title: Heather Park

author: Heather Park
title: Heather Park
text: On the recommendation of a friend who has used Blurb for years, I used Bookify to create a photo book with text of a recent vacation. Bookify was intuitive to use, and I haven't had so much fun since I ate $10 worth of candy at one go! When I had problems (and they were minor in nature) I received prompt responses from customer service with clear instructions that solved my issues. In addition, Blurb's prices are exceptionally reasonable, and frequent discount specials are offered as well.
